Title: Nobody Has to Get Hurt
Writer: George Pelecanos (created by), David Simon (created by), George Pelecanos, Chris Yakaitis (story editor), Will Ralston (story editor), Carl Capotorto (story editor)
Actors: James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gbenga Akinnagbe, Chris Bauer
Plot: Kiki finds new partners for a deal for Lori. Vincent visits his father for advice. C.C want to get payed for Red Hot.
